item.title: ZEIT Now Deploying ASP.NET (and .NET) Core Apps in seconds with your Dockerfile
item.author: info@nandotech.com (Fernando Rodriguez)
item.description: If you’re anything like me, you constantly are finding more and more tasks that require your attention. To make matters worse, the industry definition of “DevOps” is still evolving itself, quickly becoming ubiquitous with “a litle bit of everything” in the process. Like a breath of fresh air, ZEIT is a cloud service that allows near-mindless deployment of javascript & node.js apps. Much thanks probably also belongs to Scott Hanselman and his ever-tinkering soul who published “ZEIT now deployments of open source ASP.
